text.0: come o nāsatyas on your car resplendent rich in abundant wealth of kine and horses.
text.1: as harnessed steeds all our laudations follow you whose forms shine with most delightful beauty.
text.2: come with the gods associate come ye hither to us nāsatyas with your car accordant.
text.3: twixt you and us there is ancestral friendship and common kin remember and regard it.
text.4: awakened are the songs that praise the aśvins the kindred prayers and the celestial mornings.
text.5: inviting those we long for earth and heaven the singer calleth these nāsatyas hither.
text.6: what time the dawns break forth in light o aśvins to you the poets offer their devotions.
text.7: god savitar hath sent aloft his splendour and fires sing praises with the kindled fuel.
text.8: come from the west come from the cast nāsatyas come aśvins from below and from above us.
text.9: bring wealth from all sides for the fivefold people preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
